ai-tha-ap463:1.1_0: “Having become fully extinguished, the Fortunate One’s attainment of Nibbāna,
ai-tha-ap463:2.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap463:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap463:3.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap463:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap463:4.2_0: to be in the presence of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap463:5.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap463:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sālaputta.
ai-tha-ap463:7.1_0: The first Elder Nun Bhaddiya the Dwarf
